connection_error.title: Oops, 我们无法连上OL网络
connection_error.body:
很有可能是你的上游节点已经停机了.

别担心！你的账号和资产是安全的.

如果你需要更新你的节点，请点这里：

wallet.newbie_message: 看起来你还没有创建账号。

reminder_create.message_headline: 您的账号的密钥已经创建成功，但是还没有上链。
reminder_create.message_suffix: 社区并提供您的登录密钥，我们会帮助你完成登录。

account_list.message: 所有的发送的交易（包括：挖矿）都会消耗您的余额。

keygen.title: 创建新账号
keygen.description: 账户创建成功以后，只有有人向您的账户发送至少一个代币，账号才会在链上存在。
keygen.onboard_key_description: 这个登录密钥用来将你账户登录到链上的
keygen.securite_note: 这是您账号的助记词。如果丢失，没有人可以帮你。请把他记下来，不要告诉任何人。
keygen.account_tips: 您的账号还没有上链，您需要将您的登录密钥发给一个人帮助您完成账号创建。

account_from_mnem_submit.title: 备份好了吗？
account_from_mnem_submit.body:
您确定要使用这个助记词吗?

如果助记词丢失或者忘记，您将不能恢复您的账号.

这是最后的机会将它写下来.

account_from_mnem_from.title: 恢复账号
account_from_mnem_from.description: 使用您的助记词，在CARPE创建账号，查看资产和发送交易。

langapp_settings.title: Language and Appearance
langapp_settings.lang_description: Choose the language used to display

network_settings.title: 网络设置
network_settings.description: 选择节点列表，帮助您连上网络，Carpe 会在列表中随机链接列表中的节点，直至链接成功。你可以链接任何的playlist.json文件来更新节点。
network_settings.override_peers_description: 您可以强制使用某一个节点，只需要设置一个节点，他会替换上面的节点列表.
network_settings.upstream_subtitle: 大多数的WAYPOINT问题可以痛殴刷新新的Waypoint来解决

account_settings.title: 账号设置
account_settings.comfirm: 确认要从本设备中删除该账号吗？本操作不可逆。
account_settings.description: 本操作不会删除链上的账号，只会删除本设备上的信息，如果您没有保存助记词，您的账号就会被锁定，没有人能够帮你恢复这个账号。

miner_process.notes:
百分比是估算的
他是根据你前一个证明的消耗时间估算的。
miner_process.notes2: 超过100%，意味着它比它前一个证明所花的时间要长。

tower_state.proof_more: 您提交的证明数已达到今天的最大值（72）
tower_state.proof_less: 证明数量未达到获取奖励的最小值 (8)
tower_state.proof_ok: 恭喜你完成了本期需要的最小的证明数（8）

cant_start.title: 您的账号在链上还不存在。
cant_start.body: 只有您的账号在链上激活以后，挖矿程序才能启动。可能您已经在本地创建了地址，但是还没有人往您的地址里发送资产。

disco_error.title: 中断
disco_error.body: （中）Looks like there's a gap in the proofs you are submitting. Each proof needs to reference the previous one, and the proof was rejected because of this.

epoch_status.empty_body: 中There are no proofs saved to the chain. When you successfully submit your first proof, you will see some stats here.
epoch_status.in_process_body: 中Your account needs to submit at least 8 proofs per day (epoch) to receive a reward. You will receive the reward on the next day.
epoch_status.complete_body: 中Your account has submitted enough proofs today (minimum 8 proofs per epoch). You should receive rewards at the start of next epoch.
epoch_status.exceed_body:: 中You have mined 72 proofs, the maximum number of proofs per epoch. The tower can keep making proofs but they will only be accepted in the next epoch.

first_proof.title: 中Let's mine your first proof
first_proof.body:
中 Hang tight! This will take at least 30mins, maybe up to 1hr

You will see your balance go down while you mine proofs. If you reach the minimum per day, you will receive a reward, on the next day (epoch).

Check your computer settings so that the computer doesn't sleep when the screen shuts off. You want the miner running while you're not here.
first_proof.body_disabled: 中Turn the switch on to start mining!

invalid_proof.title: 中Cannot Verify Proof
invalid_proof.body: 中Weird. This proof was rejected because it is not a valid "delay proof". This is usually because parameters are not set correctly.

oops.title: 中Oops
oops.body: 中Looks like there's an error with mining a delay proof

too_many_proofs.title: 中Too Many Proofs
too_many_proofs.body: Looks like you've sent more proofs than expected during the last 24 hours. The chain expects a max {maxNum} proofs during each epoch. On the next epoch your proofs will begin to be submitted again.

wrong_difficulty.title: 中Wrong Difficulty
wrong_difficulty.body: 中Looks like you're sending a proof with the wrong difficulty parameters to the chain. Check you are connected to the right network with the correct difficulty settings.

sync_proof.title: 中Syncing your proofs
sync_proof.body_0: 中Something is wrong, you have more proofs on-chain, than on this device. You may be missing proofs locally.

onboard.title: 中Onboard an Account
onboard.no_balance_body2: 中Looks like you have less than 2 coins in your account, this means you won't be able to onboard anyone.

set_wallet_type.title: 中Set your Account Type
set_wallet_type.subtitle: 中Make sure you know what you are doing. This is not reversible. Slow and Community wallets are permanent.
set_wallet_type.btn_confirm_slow: 中Confirm Set Slow Wallet? This is not reversable.
set_wallet_type.community_confirm: 中Confirm Set Community Wallet? This is not reversable.
